#!/usr/bin/env ruby
# if we have something selected, turn it into a tag, # if we are just in a word, use that, otherwise - a blank # tag if(ENV['TM_SELECTED_TEXT'].to_s.strip != '') print("<#{ENV['TM_SELECTED_TEXT'].strip[/^\S+/]}#{ENV['TM_SELECTED_TEXT'].strip[/^\S+(\s+.*)/, 1]}>$1</#{ENV['TM_SELECTED_TEXT'].strip[/^\S+/]}>$0") else print("<${1:p}>$2</${1/\\s.*//}>$0") end
